welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Soccorro, a charming city known for its pristine beaches and friendly locals. Get ready to immerse yourself in our beautiful culture and explore all the wonders our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves international flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout all terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baler Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
